channel.title: nano on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in nano on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: A small nano but long wait
item.description: Beginning of this year sold our Indica and bought Swift-Dzire(ZDI) which we found very practical and perfect for our Indian need. And we did not thought of booking any new car in recent time. Suddenly things got changed when Pamela started a new job in May. We were quite happy with single car and personally opted for BIAS (Bangalore International Airport - Volvo) as I commute from Hebbal to Old Airport read every day around 20KM one way.
